==Details==
===Description=== The Dubious Disc costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Sinnoh:_Locations_and_items|Resort Area]] in [[Sinnoh]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | Porygon2 || | PorygonZ |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
